info.author: Nick HS
info.description:
# University of Michigan Requests Client

A wrapper around the Python [Requests](http://www.python-requests.org/en/latest/) library
that allows you to access authenticated University of Michigan resources.

## Install

With pip:

    pip install umclient

If you don't have pip you can get it with:

    easy_install pip

## Quickstart

Create a new requests client:

    from umclient import AuthenticatedUMClient

    client = AuthenticatedUMClient(username, password)

Request the authenticated resource:

    resp = client.get('http://wolverineaccess.umich.edu')
    print resp # returns a requests response object
    <Response [200]>

The client automatically logged the user in and returned the
appropriate resource.

info.name: umclient
info.summary: Authenticated Client for University of Michigan Web Services
info.html_description:
# University of Michigan Requests Client

A wrapper around the Python [Requests](http://www.python-requests.org/en/latest/) library that allows you to access authenticated University of Michigan resources.

## Install

With pip:

pip install umclient

If you don’t have pip you can get it with:

easy_install pip

## Quickstart

Create a new requests client:

from umclient import AuthenticatedUMClient

client = AuthenticatedUMClient(username, password)

Request the authenticated resource:

resp = client.get(‘http://wolverineaccess.umich.edu’) print resp # returns a requests response object <Response [200]>

The client automatically logged the user in and returned the appropriate resource.
